name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers
display_help: These Powers are given to heroes on a temporary basis.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.NoPhase
powers.display_help: Tolerance for Hibernation or being out of phase can only last so long. A brief period after activating such an ability, your body will reach a point where such powers cannot be re-activated again for 120 seconds.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Demoralized
powers.display_help: You are demoralized. Your to hit value is reduced and you are afraid.

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 30 ft. radius (16 targets max)

display_info: 25.00% chance for 5.0 terrorize for 8s on target

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.KillTk
powers.display_help: Limits the length of time Telekinesis may be used on a PVP Target.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Phenomenal_Luck
powers.display_help: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 33% for 60 seconds.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Power_Siphon
powers.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate

display_info: 25.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 10s on self
31.25% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 10s on self
25.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Mystic_Fortune
powers.display_help: You can read the fortune of any player. This grants a random permanent buff for 20 minutes, and they may not have their fortune read again during that time.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Mystic_Fortune_Lock
powers.display_help: You can read the fortune of any player. This grants a random permanent buff for 20 minutes, and they may not have their fortune read again during that time.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Vulnerability
powers.display_help: Your vulnerabilities have been exposed, your resistance to damage has been lowered.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Opportunity_Proc
powers.display_help: By carefully striking at their foes, Sentinels work towards creating opportunistic attacks that can weaken their foes or grant themselves a chance to recoup. Any enemy that a Sentinel focuses attacks on will be easier to hit and will suffer an additional 5% damage from incoming attacks. Multiple Sentinels can work together to make this effect stronger. Occasionally, the Sentinel may find an extreme vulnerability in a target that can be exploited to deliver up to 25% additional damage against it for a limited time. Only one such extreme vulnerability may be exploited at a time.

display_info: -3.75% strength to defense for 10s on target
-5.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on target
-3.75% strength to defense for 10s on target
-5.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on target

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Opportunity_Lock
powers.display_help: Oportunities allow sentinels to execute special effects.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Combo_Level_1
powers.display_help: You have used a single Combo Builder. Granting you Combo Level 1, build up to 3 levels for maximum effect when using Finishers.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Combo_Level_2
powers.display_help: You have used two Combo Builders. Granting you Combo Level 2, build up to 3 levels for maximum effect when using Finishers.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Combo_Level_3
powers.display_help: You have used three Combo Builders. Granting you Combo Level 3, execute a Finisher within the next few seconds for a large boost in effectiveness.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Time_Crawl_Debuff
powers.display_help: The world around you appears to move much more quickly than normal, as if time has been slowed. Time Manipulation debuffs and controls have a greater effect on you than normal.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Temporal_Selection_Buff
powers.display_help: Around you, the world flows in slow motion. Your every movement is accelerated, as if you're moving more quickly through time. While this effect is in play you will receive additional healing from Temporal Mending and Chrono Shift.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Beam_Rifle_Debuff
powers.display_help: While this effect is on you, Beam Rifle attacks will have secondary effects.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Perfection_of_Body_Level_1
powers.display_help: You have gained Perfection of Body Level 1 by using a Staff Fighting power while Form of the Body is active. This power grants you a minor damage bonus for a brief time.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Pack_Mentality
powers.display_help: As your Beast Mastery pets attack you will gain stacks of Pack Mentality. Each stack increases pet damage by 2% as long as they are near you. Pack Mentality stacks up to 10 times. Fortify Pack will consume all charges of Pack Mentality and prevent the user's pets from gaining additional stacks, however it will greatly boost the Defense and Regeneration of all nearby beast pets. The potency of Fortify Pack will depend on the number of stacks of Pack Mentality owned when it is used.

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 60 ft. radius (16 targets max)

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Assassins_Focus
powers.display_help: Hitting enemies with Stalker primary damaging powers, other than Assassin's Strike, can grant you a stack of Assassin's Focus. Each stack lasts for 10 seconds and will increase Assassin's Strike's critical hit chance by 33.3% when you're not hidden.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Tidal_Power
powers.display_help: Tidal Power is used to empower Water Burst, Dehydrate, Water Jet and Geyser. You can have up to three stacks of Tidal Power at a time.

powers.name: temporary_powers.temporary_powers.enhanced_water_jet_lock
powers.display_help: This power is placed on you immediately after casting an enhanced Water Jet. While this power is active you cannot use an enhanced version of Water Jet.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Bloom
powers.display_help: The healing you receive is increased by 4% per stack while this effect persists. Bloom stacks up to 5 times and each stack lasts for 30 seconds.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Psionic_Melee_Insight
powers.display_help: While you have Insight Mental Strike, Psi Blade, Telekinetic Blow, Psi Blade Sweep and Mass Levitate will cause additional psionic damage over time. Additionally, Psionic Melee powers with control effects like Boggle and Psi Blade Sweep and Greater Psi Blade have these effects empowered. Using Greater Psi Blade while you have Insight will both cause this power to deal significantly more damage and cause a greater hold effect, but will remove Insight from you. When Insight wears off you will not be able to gain Insight again for a short time.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Psionic_Melee_Insight_Lockout
powers.display_help: While you have Insight Lockout you cannot gain Insight.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Boggled
powers.display_help: While Boggled, Psionic Melee attacks made on you have a significantly higher chance to grant your attacker Insight.

powers.name: Temporary_Powers.Temporary_Powers.Molten_Embrace_Proc
